long_description: The STM Harbour 2 iPhone 5 Case cradles your iPhone 5 or 5s in a sleek and light case, protecting it from drops and scratches. Its hinged design makes it easy to remove, insert and dock your phone. Dual-density, soft-touch thermal polyurethane armors your phone from the hard knocks of an active outdoor lifestyle. Hinged design props up your phone up for viewing and makes it easy to dock it on another device or simply remove your phone from the case without a struggle. Access to all ports, buttons, controls and camera lens. Sleek and formfitting design for a comfortable carry; satin matte finish for long-term finger print and scratch resistance. The STM Harbour 2 iPhone 5 Case offers a protective rim around edge of phone.
short_description: The STM Harbour 2 iPhone 5 Case cradles your iPhone 5 or 5s in a sleek and light case, protecting it from drops and scratches. Its hinged design makes it easy to remove, insert and dock your phone.
